BBEX3.A.MWK.USD.CA.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Malawi  / USD 1 = MWK ... (buying)
Source: Reserve Bank of Malawi, Lilongwe
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates.
Comment on 1994: On 7 February 1994, the exchange rates were allowed to float freely.

Comment on 1998: On 21 and 24 August 1998, the exchange rate were adjusted more sharply. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate): 20 August 1998: USD 1 = MWK 26.6665 / 26.9345 21 August 1998: USD 1 = MWK 33.8300 / 34.1700  24 August 1998: USD 1 = MWK 41.7900 / 42.2100 Calculated using the exchange rates from 20 and 24 August 1998 the Malawi kwacha was devalued by 36.2%.

Comment on 2012: On 7 May 2012, the Malawi kwacha was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate): 4 May 2012: USD 1 = MWK 164.5375 / 167.8615 7 May 2012: USD 1 = MWK 247.50 / 252.50 Calculated devaluation: 33.5%.
